options.text: Success is 15% increase in task completion rate within 2 months.
options.why: Higher completion rates show improved efficiency due to the tool.

options.text: Success is reducing collaboration time by 20% within 3 months.
options.why: A measurable impact in the short term indicates effective intervention.

options.text: Success if task completion time decreases by 25% within 3 months.
options.why: Faster task completion indicates improved team efficiency and tool effectiveness.
